user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the main demand processor.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios...', select the most appropriate demand profile properties.

tasks.description: Select the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios from the available scenario options.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' from the available options.

tasks.description: Add a new energy carrier object for Hydrogen using the new_carrier_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, add the Hydrogen carrier object to the model.

tasks.description: Update the demand profiles to incorporate the target years: 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, update the demand profile properties with the target years 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050.

tasks.description: Split the existing nodes in the model as required.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, split the nodes in the PLEXOS model to create the required subsets.

function_args.user_input: Convert the resulting model data to tst format.

tasks.description: Convert the resulting model data to tst format.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, convert the model data file to tst format.
